description: Comprehensive intermediate-to-advanced algebra course covering quadratics, polynomials, rational expressions, exponentials, logarithms, sequences, probability, statistics, trigonometry, matrices, systems, and conic sections. Designed to prepare students for Precalculus and college-level mathematics.

topics.name: Unit 1: Algebra 1 Review
topics.description: Essential Algebra 1 concepts: linear equations, inequalities, functions, graphing, factoring, and radicals needed for success in Algebra 2

topics.name: Unit 2: Quadratic Functions & Complex Numbers
topics.description: Quadratic models, vertex and standard forms, completing the square, discriminant, complex numbers, and quadratic equation solving techniques

topics.name: Unit 3: Polynomial Functions
topics.description: Polynomial behavior, end behavior, roots and multiplicities, long/ synthetic division, remainder theorem, and graphing techniques

topics.name: Unit 4: Rational Functions & Expressions
topics.description: Rational expressions, asymptotes, discontinuities, solving rational equations, and graphing rational functions

topics.name: Unit 5: Radical Functions & Inverses
topics.description: Radical expressions, rational exponents, radical equations, inverse functions, and transformations of radical graphs

topics.name: Unit 6: Exponential Functions & Models
topics.description: Exponential growth and decay, compound interest, transformations, and real-world exponential modeling

topics.name: Unit 7: Logarithmic Functions & Equations
topics.description: Logarithm properties, solving exponential and logarithmic equations, natural logs, and real-world logarithmic models

topics.name: Unit 8: Sequences, Series & Binomial Theorem
topics.description: Arithmetic and geometric sequences, sigma notation, partial sums, binomial expansion, and Pascalâ€™s triangle

topics.name: Unit 9: Probability & Counting
topics.description: Permutations, combinations, probability rules, conditional probability, and combinatorial reasoning

topics.name: Unit 10: Statistics & Data Analysis
topics.description: Data distributions, regression, variability, correlation, and interpreting statistical models

topics.name: Unit 11: Trigonometric Functions
topics.description: Unit circle, trigonometric ratios, radian measure, periodic functions, and basic trig graphs

topics.name: Unit 12: Trigonometric Identities & Equations
topics.description: Fundamental identities, verifying identities, trig equations, and transformations

topics.name: Unit 13: Advanced Systems & Inequalities
topics.description: Nonlinear systems, inequalities in two variables, graphing regions, and system modeling

topics.name: Unit 14: Matrices & Determinants
topics.description: Matrix operations, inverses, determinants, transformations, and solving systems using matrices

topics.name: Unit 15: Conic Sections & Parametrics
topics.description: Ellipses, hyperbolas, parabolas, graphing conic sections, and modeling with parametric equations
